column2: Nubby's Number Factory{a}{a}A game by MogDog.{a}{a}{a}Soundtrack by Vinegart (Malakai Martin){a}{a}{a}{a}

Demo localization:{a}Santi - Spanish Localization{a}YuruSoda - Brazilian Portuguese Localization{a}CatKrakenStudio Localization Team - Russian Localization{a}{a}CatKrakenStudio:{a}{a}Daniil (G02m0n1k}{a}Artyom (Loomen){a}Inokentie (KUsHa){a}

{a}{a}Special thanks to:{a}-Pheebie, Clownmodius, Dave, Pol, Gab, Sir Podzol, and Erwann for help playtesting.{a}-Clownmodius, for help with Goblony artwork.{a}-HarrisonD, for Dwarf Tony supervisor reskin (contest winner){a}-GoozBooz, Jahck, Rusty, Pheebie, Sir Podzol, YcelptYC, picmiz, Clownmodius, ianokay, culprits1, and toasterstoastforks - for your nubby reskin designs (they're coming soon, don't worry!)
*Squids are {b}x more likely to appear in Nubby-Mart.{a}*Squids cost {c}% less.
*Start the game with {b} coins.{a}*You will enter Nubby-Mart when the game starts.{a}*Rare and ultra rare items are twice as likely to appear in shops.
*You receive +3 coins per restock instead of 1.{a}*Maximum coins limit is raised to {b}.{a}*You lose two lives when you launch Nubby.
*Items have two trigger types.{a}*For example, an item could trigger when the round goal is passed OR when Nubby dies.
*All items are half priced.{a}*+3 rerolls in all shops.{a}*Items have a {b}% chance to shatter when they trigger.
*Adds a moving target to the bottom of the pegboard.{a}*If Nubby hits the target, gain +{b} coins AND double total score.{a}*You cannot gain coins from restocks.
*Item and perk triggers are randomized at the start of the run. Don't question it.
*Black market items can appear in Nubby-Mart and mystery capsules. Black market items cost money in Nubby-Mart.
*Start game with {b} coins.{a}*You cannot gain more coins.
*Replaces endless mode with prestige mode.{a}*When you win, you can prestige.{a}*This restarts the game and increases the difficulty for each prestige level.
Not implemented yet. I swear it'll be done by the 7th.
Warning: Using a custom seed disables achievements and stars.
(Click an item to drag and drop it into your inventory.)
(Press [{a}] on items in your inventory to sell them.)

[#ffffff]{a}*Every item in your inventory gives points equal to a random peg's number.

Blood drops will rapidly rain down from above and halve the first peg they come in contact with.
The side walls of the factory turn into brimstone. When Nubby hits brimstone, lose {a}% of your total points
Tony shoots lazers from his eyes! If a peg is hit by a lazer, its number will be reduced to 1.
All item slots full.{a}Sell items to make room!{a}{a}[Press {b} items to sell]
Too poor! Get more money to buy this!
Drag and drop an item over this button to freeze them!{a}(Frozen items won't go away when you reroll or leave the shop.)
Beat the game at least once to unlock!
Must play at least one game to unlock!
Not enough stars! Play the game and take on challenges to get stars!
Stars are a currency used to unlock things. You can obtain stars by doing well in-game!
Note: Perks are permanent. You cannot sell or get rid of them.
Hey. You must be the new employee they were telling me about.
My name is Tony and I'm gonna be your supervisor.
My job is to show you how to run the factory.
I don't really care about your name or anything so let's just get into this.
First things first, welcome aboard to Nubby's Number Factory - the world's leading number manufacturer!
This is the main control center of the factory.
Your first task is to launch our mascot, Nubby, down the peg board.
Hold down [{a}] and press [{b}] to launch Nubby.
Wow, you're really good at this.
At this factory, your only job is to make big numbers...
By launching Nubby at these pegs, you will earn however many points are shown on the peg.
This number shows how many points you made in a round.
The number on the bottom is the goal. If you beat the goal, the board will restock.
If you get a REALLY high score, the board can restock multiple times in a single round.
Oh wait.. I forgot to tell you what a restock even is!
Well listen up, because restocks are an important thing!
When the board restocks, a bunch of NEW pegs will fall from the sky and fill all your empty spaces.
Soon after, pairs of pegs with the same number will merge into one greater peg.
Let's try it out. Keep launching Nubby until you beat the goal.{a}[{b}] + [{c}]
You can do better than that. Do it again.
Pegtacular! That was pegalicious! You're a star!
Ok. We're almost done. To rearrange your new pegs, press the jumble button.
Nice. Launch Nubby one more time [{a}] + [{b}]. I wanna show you something.
So you might have noticed that Nubby goes through some pegs, but not others.
Nubby will break through 1's, but will bounce off any peg greater than 1.
Alright bud, that's it for the tutorial. You'll figure the rest out for yourself.
OH! WAIT! WAIT! I FORGOT ONE THING!
Everytime you launch Nubby, you lose one life. If you run out of lives, the sun will explode.
But luckily, everytime the board restocks, you get one life back.
So as long as you keep making big numbers, nobody gets hurt.
Ok now I'm done. Thanks for not pressing the {a}skip tutorial{a} button. I know that was difficult for you.
I'll start you off with a fresh, new factory now. Good luck.
This game has the potential to induce seizures{a}with people who have photosensitive epilepsy.
[#000000]{a}*Receive a suspicious key...{a}[#800000]*Suspicious key: On the next shop turn, you will gain access to the black market.
[#000000]{a}*Receive a plastic key...{a}[#00802b]*Plastic key: On the next shop turn, you will gain access to the bargain bin.
[#000000]{a}*{b}% chance to receive a random common item.{a}*{c}% chance to receive a random common perk.{a}*{d}% chance to receive a random rare item.{a}*{e}% chance to receive a random rare perk.
Click on the capsule to open it!
Click on the prize to drag and drop it into your inventory!
Tip: Press [{a}] on an item in your inventory to sell it and make space.
Click on the prize to take it!
[#99e6e6]GLASS ITEM[#ffffff]:{a}*This item has a 5% chance to shatter when it triggers.
*DISABLED ITEMS:{a}[#ffffff]*Disabled items cannot trigger for the rest of the round.
Drag and drop food items into the mouth to eat!
You just lost all your coins!
*Items in shops are replaced by various mystery boxes.{a}*Mystery boxes give a random item when purchased.
*You can jumble pegs once PER GAME.{a}*Rerolling items in shops is disabled.
*Maximum coins are capped at 10.{a}*Items that cost more than 10 coins have reduced prices.
*Rare items, foods, and perks cannot be found.
*Items will be deleted 15 rounds after they were obtained.{a}*Upgrading items will reset their expiration date.
*During restocks, you can only gain +1 life at most - even if you restocked more than once.{a}*You cannot gain lives using any alternative method.
*Failure to meet the quota on any round will result in the left-most item being deleted.
*A C-4 is strapped to Nubby.{a}*Nubby will explode and die after 1.5 seconds, causing a big explosion that pops pegs.
*If you start a round with more than 1 item in your inventory, all items will be disabled for the rest of the round.
